mapper.select: SELECT writer, r_name, r_phone, r_do, r_si, r_gu, r_dong, r_cat, r_url, r_id, r_lon, r_lat,r_image_url, c_name, c_phone, c_do, c_si, c_gu, c_dong, c_cat, c_url,c_id, c_lon, c_lat ,c_image_url, COUNT(rest_name) AS NUM, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(rest_name) DESC) AS GRADE FROM course JOIN cafe ON (cafe_id = c_id) JOIN restaurant ON (rest_id = r_id) WHERE gender >= 0 AND rest_id = r_id AND cafe_id = c_id ${gender} ${age} ${do} ${si} GROUP BY rest_name, cafe_name LIMIT 5;
